This position will work across a spectrum of external partners and internal stakeholders, including product, data, brand marketing, digital marketing, and supply.ResponsibilitiesEnsure high visibility for Vroomâs inventory across a broad spectrum of acquisition channels, via management over a suite of data-feed oriented toolsCreate, deploy, and measure feed-based optimization testsMonitor dashboards, tracking product feed healthProject manage copy and creative implementation through the spectrum of external partnersSupport partnership development, onboarding, and ad-hoc marketing analysis through research, data collection, and data validationCreate, manage, and deploy website UTM tracking codes and phone numbers across the marketing organizationRequirementsDemonstrated strength in deductive reasoning, logic, numbers, and problem-solving skillsHighly sophisticated communication skills (oral and written)Positive attitude and presentable demeanor with an ability to work collaboratively in a rapidly changing environmentStrong team playerHigh attention to detailStrong work ethic, drive and staminaAbility to work independently with intense and consistent focusStrong organization and time management skills
